articles.title: US actor arrested over alleged Ponzi scheme - RTE.ie

articles.title: First COVID-19 vaccine shot alone not protective — Chile study - GMA News
articles.description: A study in Chile, which has one of the furthest-advanced vaccination campaigns in South America — mainly with China's Coronavac, has found that a first dose alone does not protect against coronavirus infection.
